comment: yeah i didnt have her she just hit my car and caused damage and is lying about what happened and is refusing to pay for it.
Very unprofessional and uses an attitude toward students for occurrences that are not their fault in any way.

Very difficult class. Two tests midterm + final both worth 200 points! Short answer/essay application questions. 4 M.C. quizzes also difficult. 3 mini 500 wd compare/contrast papers. Pretty easy. And one annoying group proj creating a crisis mngt plan for existing company and present. Overall tough class but nice professor.

The class is difficult. Only two tests midterm and final but both are worth 200 points! Short answer/essay application questions. Very difficult. A lot of outside readings required. 4 quizes multiple choice pretty hard as well. 3 mini 500 wd compare/contrast papers. And 1 annoying group proj create a crisis mngt plan. Nice prof though.
Dr. Gainey is very fair.  The class is not easy, but it is not difficult if you do your assigned readings.  The wording is tricky but if you study you will do fine.

How many more classes must we take about Twitter?  This teacher needs to be teaching a world literature class. Her communication methods are irrelevant to the present and future social statuses of our society.  She is a nice person.  However, her teaching style illustrates the mentality: "Although we are communication teachers, we are not experts."
talks about stuff that is totally irrelevant for modern pr. could read the book and get the whole class. pretends she knows what happens, but out of the industry for a long time. boring, too.
the class isn't easy but you learn a lot. expect to study hard for the tests. she is a very fair teacher
